title: 怎么用命令方块弄减少血量
txt_content: 单人游戏怎么用命令方块减少玩家血量，就像弄到1颗心那样的

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content: 使用effect指令来给予凋零效果即可

chyx 发表于 2017-6-21 15:13

replies.txt_content: 附加一个瞬间伤害就好/effect 7

直接高频接/replaceitem entity @a slot.armor.head skull 1 3 {AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Amount:-18,UUIDLeast:65464,UUIDMost:654,Operation:0,Name:dsa54}]}
